summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department; authorizing the purchase by real estate contract of certain property in Sections 19, 20, 21, 27, 28, 29, 30, 32, 33 and 34, Township 38 North, Range 32 E., W.M. and Section 5, Township 37 North, Range 32 East, W.M., Ferry County, Washington to exchange for Forest Service property in the Cedar River Watershed.
